main.name: Vania Dimova
main.description: Coding is like magic - it gives you all the tools to create what you can ivission
main.bio: Hi there! I am Vania ... I am the co-founder of VaniaD Studio. As a Full Stack developer, I've worked with startups and small corporations to help build & scale their companies. Along the journey, my goal is to aid others excel and pursue their dreams. I deliver REAL VALUE by creating REAL WORLD projects. I am hands-on experience and have the skills that are required to bring success.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch, be a part of VaniaD Studio!

testimonials.text: Vania is absolutely excellent, her depth of knowledge & her mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Working with Vania has been AWESOME, she makes solvoingproblems so easy and approachable, and we know the result will be success!
